virtual GISGEOM_API GisInt32 GisIGeometry::GetDimensionality (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Gets the dimensionality of ordinates in this object.

Remarks:
Values are from the GisDimensionality enumeration. A return type of "GisInt32" is used instead of the enumeration, catering to typical use with bit masking.
Returns:
Returns the ordinate dimensionality
Comments or suggestions? Send us feedback.
